name: Flower Power
description: Flower Power is a hybrid weed strain made from a genetic cross between Power Plant and an unknown parent strain. This strain is 88% sativa and 12% indica. Flower Power is 19% THC, making this strain an ideal choice for experienced cannabis consumers. Bred by Royal Queen Seeds, the average price of Flower Power typically ranges from $10-$15 per gram.
